body: I got from next source, basically the sisters sign pact with heaven and hell so the brothers soul could go back to the living.. they thanked him for his effort to save them from truck crash
Truck-kun, ruining your anime and hentai alike. Fuck Truck-kun
Yeaaaa im probably gonna just keep the other chapters without this one even if its translated. Im not gonna ruin a good H manga with this ending
You are monster. I can't fab with this thing.

I can't read any of this words so i interpreted the story like this: The brother was meeting his 2 little sisters (based on the title) at an intersection then a truck crashed the little sisters and their brother failed to save them and got injured. In his dreams at the hospital, the sisters thanked her brother by *cough*service*cough*,after the brother woke up,he ended up with regret of failing to save them. So i don't know why @Iexpectedbetter said he killed both of them?
